H0.text: who was the father of king george vi. Edward VII

H1.text: who was the father of king george vi. Prince Albert

H2.text: who was the father of king george vi. King George IV

H3.text: who was the father of king george vi. George V

A4.text: George V was the second son of the Prince and Princess of Wales (later King Edward VII and Queen Alexandra).

A5.text: George was third in the line of succession to the British throne behind his father, and his elder brother, Prince Albert Victor.

A6.text: His father ascended the throne as George V in 1910.

A7.text: The future George VI was named Albert at birth after his late great-grandfather Prince Albert of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha.
